body.p:
Hopkinsville Spt 24th 1864
To his Excelency --
Gov T E Bramlett.

The Undersigned citizens of Christian County, beg leave to represent to your Hon. that at the present september term of our circuit Court. one of our citizens Henry Edmondson. was called to answer an Indictment for keeping a Gaming house or permitting Games in a house under his control Edmondson plead guilty to the charge and the Jury returned a verdict and Judgment of three hundred Dollars. We are personally acquainted with Edmondson and beg to state that he has ever been a Law abiding true Loyal citizen he is Young Poor. and has a family dependant upon his Labour for support Knowing all the facts as we do we most respectfully and urgently request that the fine or so much as your Honor can may be remitted

J. B. Gowen D. S.
Jo. McCarroll S. C. C.
C A. McCarroll
